original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1136)@</color>召喚 <color=#ccffcc>1</color> 座<color=#4cc769>城樓</color>加入我軍，且以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(1136)@</color> <color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對自身範圍內敵方造成法術傷害，並在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4462)@</color> 秒內提升我方全體防禦設施 <color=#ccffcc>22%</color> 所有抗性，且恢復防禦設施 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_HP(4682)@</color> 體力。<color=#4cc769>城樓</color>屬性<color=#FFE787>體力值：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_HP(1371)@</color>   <color=#FFE787>武力值：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_Str(1371)@</color>每 <color=#ccffcc>6</color> 秒發動一次特殊攻擊以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(531)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>對自身範圍內敵方造成物理傷害
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1136)@</color>Summon <color=#ccffcc>1</color> Seat<color=#4cc769> Tower</color> joined our army, and with <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(1136)@</color> <color=#13ccd7>Int</color> inflicted spell damage on the enemy within its own range. <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4462)@</color> Increase all our defense facilities within seconds <color=#ccffcc>22%</color> All resistances, and restore defense facilities <color=#ccffcc> $Status_HP(4682)@</color> Physical strength. <color=#4cc769>City Tower</color>Attribute<color=#FFE787>Physical strength value: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_HP(1371)@</color> <color=#FFE787>HP: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_Str(1371)@</color> every <color=#ccffcc>6</color> every second launch a special attack to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(531)@ </color> <color=#80cc00>War</color> Causes physical damage to the enemy within its range
